column5: Hi All,  Well i'm at work at the moment  , but i'm lucky enough to work at a boarding school right on the lake. I took a couple of the students for a sneeky 1/2 fish on the rocks and we did pretty well, fish for supper tonight. We were just throwing out twisty tail grubs and live minnows on jigs, there's a big current here so you can just let the bait drift down and the current lifts and makes the bait swim just by lifting the rod tip, dont have to really even reel in...and bam! good fun.   ALL IN A DAY'S WORK     ITS NOT FOR MY BENEFIT>>>I DO IT FOR MY STUDENTS!!      SUPPER!
You have to be the favourite staff     Great lifeskills....how can anyone argue that.  Congrats
oh the sacrifices...I don't know how you manage with tough parts of the job like that
